sources.title: Mystery at the Burlesque
sources.description: Title: Mystery at the Burlesque Summary: A man watching a musical show at the Windmill theatre is shot apparently from the stage. The cast continues the performance so that the detective can solve the murder. Directed by: Val Guest Actors: Garry Marsh, Jon Pertwee, Jack Livesey Production Company: Angel Productions Release Date: 16 April 1950 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A man watching a musical show at the Windmill theatre is shot apparently from the stage. The cast continues the performance so that the detective can solve the murder.
